verses.verse: מִזְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> miz-Mor A Psalm שִׁ֗יר <WH7892> Shir, [or] Song לְי֣וֹם <WH3117> le-Yom day הַשַּׁבָּֽת׃ <WH7676> hash-shab-Bat. for the sabbath ט֗וֹב <WH2896> Tov, [It is a] good לְהֹד֥וֹת <WH3034> le-ho-Dot [thing] to give thanks לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; unto the LORD וּלְזַמֵּ֖ר <WH2167> u-le-zam-Mer and to sing praises לְשִׁמְךָ֣ <WH8034> le-shim-Cha unto thy name עֶלְיֽוֹן׃ <WH5945> el-Yon. O most High

לְהַגִּ֣יד <WH5046> le-hag-Gid To shew forth בַּבֹּ֣קֶר <WH1242> bab-Bo-ker in the morning חַסְֽדֶּ֑ךָ <WH2617> chas-De-cha; thy lovingkindness וֶ֝אֱמֽוּנָתְךָ֗ <WH530> ve-'e-mu-na-te-cha, and thy faithfulness בַּלֵּילֽוֹת׃ <WH3915> bal-lei-Lot. every night

עֲ‍ ֽלֵי־ <WH5921> 'alei- with עָ֭שׂוֹר <WH6218> 'A-sor Upon an instrument of ten strings וַעֲלֵי־ <WH5921> va-'a-lei- and with נָ֑בֶל <WH5035> Na-vel; and upon the psaltery עֲלֵ֖י <WH5921> 'a-Lei with הִגָּי֣וֹן <WH1902> hig-ga-Yon with a solemn sound בְּכִנּֽוֹר׃ <WH3658> be-chin-Nor. upon the harp

כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki for שִׂמַּחְתַּ֣נִי <WH8055> sim-mach-Ta-ni hast made me glad יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh For thou LORD בְּפָעֳלֶ֑ךָ <WH6467> be-fo-'o-Le-cha; through thy work בְּֽמַעֲשֵׂ֖י <WH4639> be-ma-'a-Sei in the works יָדֶ֣יךָ <WH3027> ya-Dei-cha of thy hands אֲרַנֵּֽן׃ <WH7442> 'a-ran-Nen. I will triumph

מַה־ <WH4100> mah- How גָּדְל֣וּ <WH1431> ga-de-Lu how great מַעֲשֶׂ֣יךָ <WH4639> ma-'a-Sei-cha are thy works יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; O LORD מְ֝אֹ֗ד <WH3966> me-'Od, are very עָמְק֥וּ <WH6009> 'a-me-Ku deep מַחְשְׁבֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH4284> mach-she-vo-Tei-cha. [and] thy thoughts

אִֽישׁ־ <WH376> 'ish- man בַּ֭עַר <WH1198> Ba-'ar A brutish לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo no יֵדָ֑ע <WH3045> ye-Da'; knoweth וּ֝כְסִ֗יל <WH3684> u-che-Sil, not neither doth a fool לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- Nor יָבִ֥ין <WH995> ya-Vin understand אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- זֹֽאת׃ <WH2063> Zot. likewise

בִּפְרֹ֤חַ <WH6524> bif-Ro-ach spring רְשָׁעִ֨ים׀ <WH7563> re-sha-'Im When the wicked כְּמ֥וֹ <WH3644> ke-Mo like עֵ֗שֶׂב <WH6212> 'E-sev, as the grass וַ֭יָּצִיצוּ <WH6692> Vai-ya-tzi-tzu do flourish כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- and all פֹּ֣עֲלֵי <WH6466> Po-'a-lei and when all the workers אָ֑וֶן <WH205> 'A-ven; of iniquity לְהִשָּֽׁמְדָ֥ם <WH8045> le-hish-sha-me-Dam [it is] that they shall be destroyed עֲדֵי־ <WH5703> 'a-dei- for ever עַֽד׃ <WH5704> 'Ad. against
וְאַתָּ֥ה <WH859> ve-'at-Tah you מָר֗וֹם <WH4791> ma-Rom, [art most] high לְעֹלָ֥ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam for evermore יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. But thou LORD

כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki For הִנֵּ֪ה <WH2009> hin-Neh behold אֹיְבֶ֡יךָ׀ <WH341> 'o-ye-Vei-cha For lo thine enemies יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- For הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> hin-Neh behold אֹיְבֶ֣יךָ <WH341> 'o-ye-Vei-cha for lo thine enemies יֹאבֵ֑דוּ <WH6> yo-Ve-du; shall perish יִ֝תְפָּרְד֗וּ <WH6504> yit-pa-re-Du, shall be scattered כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- All פֹּ֥עֲלֵי <WH6466> Po-'a-lei all the workers אָֽוֶן׃ <WH205> 'A-ven. of iniquity

וַתָּ֣רֶם <WH7311> vat-Ta-rem shalt thou exalt כִּרְאֵ֣ים <WH7214> kir-'Eim like [the horn of] an unicorn קַרְנִ֑י <WH7161> kar-Ni; But my horn בַּ֝לֹּתִ֗י <WH1101> bal-lo-Ti, I shall be anointed בְּשֶׁ֣מֶן <WH8081> be-She-men oil רַעֲנָֽן׃ <WH7488> ra-'a-Nan. with fresh

וַתַּבֵּ֥ט <WH5027> vat-tab-Bet also shall see עֵינִ֗י <WH5869> 'ei-Ni, Mine eye בְּשׁ֫וּרָ֥י <WH7790> be-Shu-Rai [my desire] on mine enemies בַּקָּמִ֖ים <WH6965> bak-ka-Mim that rise up עָלַ֥י <WH5921> 'a-Lai against מְרֵעִ֗ים <WH7489> me-re-'Im, [my desire] of the wicked תִּשְׁמַ֥עְנָה <WH8085> tish-Ma'-nah shall hear אָזְנָֽי׃ <WH241> 'a-ze-Nai. [and] mine ears

צַ֭דִּיק <WH6662> Tzad-dik The righteous כַּתָּמָ֣ר <WH8558> kat-ta-Mar like the palm tree יִפְרָ֑ח <WH6524> yif-Rach; shall flourish כְּאֶ֖רֶז <WH730> ke-'E-rez like a cedar בַּלְּבָנ֣וֹן <WH3844> bal-le-va-Non in Lebanon יִשְׂגֶּֽה׃ <WH7685> yis-Geh. he shall grow

שְׁ֭תוּלִים <WH8362> tu-lim Those that be planted בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> be-Veit in the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; of the LORD בְּחַצְר֖וֹת <WH2691> be-chatz-Rot in the courts אֱלֹהֵ֣ינוּ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-nu of our God יַפְרִֽיחוּ׃ <WH6524> yaf-Ri-chu. shall flourish

ע֭וֹד <WH5750> od will still יְנוּב֣וּן <WH5107> ye-nu-Vun They shall still bring forth fruit בְּשֵׂיבָ֑ה <WH7872> be-sei-Vah; in old age דְּשֵׁנִ֖ים <WH1879> de-she-Nim they shall be fat וְרַֽעֲנַנִּ֣ים <WH7488> ve-ra-'a-nan-Nim and flourishing יִהְיֽוּ׃ <WH1961> yih-Yu. become

לְ֭הַגִּיד <WH5046> Le-hag-gid To shew כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for יָשָׁ֣ר <WH3477> ya-Shar [is] upright יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; that the LORD צ֝וּרִ֗י <WH6697> tzu-Ri, [he is] my rock וְֽלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- is no; עֹלָתָה 'o-la-tah כעַוְלָ֥תָה <WH5766> 'av-La-tah iniquity קבּֽוֹ׃ bo.
